players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie was killed by the mafia. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I think we should discuss what everyone was doing last night and see if anyone noticed anything suspicious."

You: "I agree we need to be careful. With Charlie gone, there are three of us left - one mafioso among us. Bob, your immediate call for discussion seems reasonable, but I'm curious what Diana thinks about our situation."
Diana: "I have crucial information that can help us win this game. Last night I investigated Bob and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to save the town."
Bob: remained silent.

You: "Diana's claim to be the detective is very convenient. If she really investigated Bob, why didn't she share this crucial information immediately? Her timing seems suspicious - I think Diana might be the mafioso trying to frame Bob."

Diana: "Alice, I understand your skepticism, but I am the detective. Bob has remained silent because he knows he's caught. If I were lying, Bob would be defending himself vigorously right now. His silence speaks volumes."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
